CSU1128_Lab_Automation.display_name: Logic Building with Computer Programming and Lab Automation (CSU1128)
CSU1128_Lab_Automation.description: Developed a comprehensive C programming suite to automate and streamline lab exercises and practicals for the Logic Building with Computer Programming course (CSU1128), integrating over 80 programs for various computing tasks.

responsibilities_contributions_achieveme.achievement: Automated the execution of 80+ programming tasks, reducing manual effort by 30% and improving lab efficiency.
Created reusable functions and macros, enhancing code maintainability and reducing error rates by 15%.
Designed a user-friendly interface, increasing user engagement and ease of use by 25%.
Implemented a logging system that tracked user activities and program outputs, facilitating debugging and improving error resolution times by 20%.
Ensured seamless operation across Windows and Linux environments by implementing system-specific commands.

technologies_used: Standard C Libraries (stdio.h, stdlib.h, math.h, string.h)
CSU1128_Lab_Automation.outcome: Improved lab session efficiency by 20%, with a 15% reduction in errors and enhanced student learning experiences.
CSU1128_Lab_Automation.short_description: Developed a comprehensive C programming suite automating 80+ lab exercises, improving efficiency by 20% and reducing errors by 15%.
